blogPost.title: What was your diet like as a tennis player? Answer by @TheRealPatCash, Wimbledon champion, 5 time Grand Slam finalist. https://t.co/WE0hF8k2S2 https://t.co/mTvpMrQZIZ
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 作为一名网球运动员，你的饮食是怎样的？回答者：@TheRealPatCash，温网冠军，5次大满贯决赛冠军。https://t.co/WE0hF8k2S2 https://t.co/mTvpMrQZIZ。
作爲一名網球運動員，你的飲食是怎樣的？回答者：@TheRealPatCash，溫網冠軍，5次大滿貫決賽冠軍。https://t.co/WE0hF8k2S2 https://t.co/mTvpMrQZIZ。
テニスプレイヤーとしての食事はどのようなものでしたか？Answer by @TheRealPatCash, Wimbledon champion, 5 times Grand Slam finalist. https://t.co/WE0hF8k2S2 https://t.co/mTvpMrQZIZ

previous.title: What will cloud technology look like over the next 10-20 years? Answer by @LynchBigData, CEO of @AtScale. https://t.co/jvoaB6Ntey https://t.co/UPzAn8T8xY

localize.full_text: 未来10-20年，云技术会是什么样子？由@AtScale首席执行官林奇大数据回答。https://t.co/jvoaB6Ntey https://t.co/UPzAn8T8xY。

今後10～20年の間に、クラウド技術はどのようになっていくのでしょうか。AtScale社のCEOである@LynchBigData氏の回答。https://t.co/jvoaB6Ntey https://t.co/UPzAn8T8xY

next.title: What was it like to immigrate to the US by yourself at such a young age? Answer by Yong Kim, CEO and Cofounder @Wonolo. https://t.co/6q6b6NgCGc https://t.co/s9nMG7RY3l

localize.full_text: 这么小的年纪就自己移民到美国是什么感觉？由CEO兼联合创始人@Wonolo金勇回答。https://t.co/6q6b6NgCGc https://t.co/s9nMG7RY3l。
